ability.name: Empowered Strike

ability.desc:
Fire a burst of energy at a random enemy that deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to adjacent enemies and reduces Max Mana by @MaxManaReduction@ (down to a min of 10).

Every 3rd cast is empowered and bursts towards 3 different targets instead of 1.
ability.name: Soulflare

ability.desc: Launch <scaleLevel>@NumOfAttacks@</scaleLevel> attacks, one at the target and the rest at nearby enemies, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to each.
ability.name: Dark Vigil

ability.desc: Fire an arrow at the farthest enemy, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the first enemy hit and <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> them for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds. If the arrow travels at least @HexThreshold@ hexes, Stun duration doubles. Enemies within 1 hex receive <scaleLevel>@ReducedEffectiveness*100@%</scaleLevel> of these effects.
ability.name: Enchanted Arrow

ability.desc:
Summon the sentinel, Daisy, who receives @DaisyBonusAPConversion@% (%i:scaleAP%) of Ivern's Ability Power and immediately casts Shockwave upon arrival.

If Daisy is already in battle, increase her Ability Power by @ModifiedAbilityPowerBonus@ (%i:scaleAP%) and command her to cast Shockwave again.
ability.name: Daisy!

ability.desc: Baby Dragons are immune to crowd control effects.
ability.name: Turret Plating

ability.desc:
Leap towards the current target and slam the ground. Enemies within a 3-hex radius are Stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds and take @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
This damage is doubled against shielded targets.
ability.name: Doombringer

ability.desc:
Scatter @MushroomCount@ Infernal Souls around a random enemy. When an enemy nears an Infernal Soul (or after @DetonationDelay@ seconds), it explodes, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to nearby enemies and @AttackSpeedSlowTooltip@% Chills them for @DebuffDuration@ seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed
ability.name: Teemo's Cruelty

ability.desc:
Call down a sword that strikes 3 hexes around the current target, dealing @ModifiedPercentMaxHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) of each target's max Health in magic damage and Shredding them for @MRShredDuration@ seconds.

Gain a Shield equal to @ModifiedShieldPercent@(%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) of his maximum Health for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist by @MRShredTooltip@%
ability.name: God-Lion's Justice

ability.desc: Send a surge of vines towards the farthest enemy, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> all enemies hit for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.
ability.name: Grasping Roots

ability.desc:
Swap between Turtle and Tiger stance with each cast, gaining the following benefits:
Turtle: Gain @ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
Tiger: The next attack strikes 3 times quickly for @ModifiedPercentAD@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage per strike.
ability.name: Feral Instinct

ability.desc:
Passive: Ascend every @AscensionDelay@ seconds. Each bonus stacks with the previous, until full ascension.

1st: Attacks deal @TotalAttackDamage@(%i:scaleAD%) bonus true damage.
2nd: Attacks explode, dealing the same damage to adjacent enemies.
3rd: Every @NumAttacksImmunity@th attack grants immunity to damage for @ImmunityDuration@ second.
4th: Attacks cause swords to rain down around the target, dealing @TotalAoEDamage@(%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
ability.name: Divine Ascent

ability.desc:
Corrupt the soul of a target for @Duration@ seconds, Stunning them and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage that increases by @IncreasePercent@% each second. Allies prefer not to target the victim during soul corruption. Viego will be interrupted if he is stunned.

If the victim dies, they resurrect at full Health to fight for him, but lose @DecayPercentDamagePerSecond@% of their max Health per second. Resurrected enemies receive the Trait bonuses of Viego's team instead of their own.
ability.name: Sovereign's Domination

ability.desc:
Passive: Ignore @ArmorPenPercent@% of the current target's Armor.

Active: Spin an axe, empowering the next attack to deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) bonus physical damage. It will return to Draven's original location after striking the target. If Draven catches it, he will empower the axe again.

Draven can spin up to 2 axes at a time.
ability.name: Spinning Axes

ability.desc: <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> the target for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the target receive 50% of this effect.
ability.name: Anchor Slam

ability.desc:
Transform into a cougar, gaining @Armor@ Armor and @AttackSpeedPercent@% Attack Speed, then leap behind the lowest Health enemy.

Every fourth attack deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage"
ability.name: Aspect of the Cougar

ability.desc: Smash the ground around the current target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@</magicDamage> magic damage,  <TFTKeyword>Knocking up</TFTKeyword> all nearby enemies for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.
ability.name: Shockwave

ability.desc: Leap into the air and create a tether to the farthest ally. Upon landing, the tether breaks and <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> all nearby enemies in its path for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds. Nearby allies gain a <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Attract and Repel

ability.desc: <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> the current target for @StunDuration@ seconds and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Then gain <TFTKeyword>Frost Armor</TFTKeyword>, granting <scaleLevel>@DefensiveStats@</scaleLevel> Armor and Magic Resist for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Fury of the North

ability.desc: Throw an arcane bomb at the current target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Arcane Bomb

ability.desc: After a brief wind up, punch forward in a cone, reducing enemies' armor by <scaleLevel>@ModifiedArmorShred@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleLevel> for @ArmorShredDuration@ seconds and dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ %i:scaleAD%</physicalDamage> physical damage.
ability.name: Haymaker

ability.desc: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Attacks heal for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>.  For every @PercentHealth@% of missing Health, gain <scaleLevel>@AttackSpeed*100@%</scaleLevel> Attack Speed.
ability.name: Berserker Rage

ability.desc: For @StanceDuration@ seconds, gain <scaleLevel>@DamageReduction*100@%</scaleLevel> Durability that increases by @DamageReductionIncrease*100@% each attack, up to @DamageReductionMax*100@%. Then, strike the current target for <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Defiant Dance

ability.desc: Leap away from enemies and gain <TFTKeyword>@ModifiedAttackSpeedPercent@</TFTKeyword> (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Rocket Jump

ability.desc: Launch black mist toward the farthest enemy. <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> the first enemy it hits for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds, and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Last Embrace

ability.desc:
Rain 4 waves of bullets down around the current target, dealing @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) total magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes, and @HealingReduction@% Wounding them for @HealingReductionDuration@ seconds.

Wound: Reduce Healing Received
ability.name: Make It Rain

ability.desc:
Charge the surrounding area for @Duration@ seconds, Taunting enemies within while gaining @PercentDamageReduction*100@% Durability. Upon releasing the charge, deal @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies within @HexRange@ hexes and heal for @ModifiedPercentHealed@ (%i:scaleAP%) of the damage blocked.

Taunt: Enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter.
ability.name: Shield of Durand

ability.desc: After a brief delay, teleport behind the target and summon a murder of crows with a 3-hex radius for <TFTBonus>@Duration@</TFTBonus> seconds, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage per second to all enemies within. Each enemy death within the flock extends its duration by <TFTBonus>@ExtendedDuration@</TFTBonus> second and heals Fiddlesticks for <TFTBonus>@PercentHeal*100@%</TFTBonus> of their max Health.
ability.name: Crowstorm

ability.desc:
Dash around target and perform @Snips@ rapid scissor snips in a cone in front, each dealing @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) plus @PercentMaxHealth*100@% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Snips steal @Defenses@ Armor and Magic resist from their target.
Gwen will perform double the snips in every other cast.

ability.desc:
Passive: Sunder any enemies hit for @TotalShredDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.

Active: Launch and swing untargetably from a grappling hook toward the farthest enemy, gaining @AttackSpeedPercent@% %i:scaleAS% for @BuffDuration@ seconds. While swinging, continue attacking the nearest enemy at double Attack Speed.

Sunder: Reduce Armor by 50%
ability.name: Heroic Swing

ability.desc: Face the farthest enemy and fire <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShots@</TFTBonus> shots in that direction for @Duration@ seconds, dashing on occasion to keep hitting enemies. Each shot deals <physicalDamage>@ModifiedAttackDamage@(%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@(%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: The Culling

ability.desc: Pyke leaves a phantom at his location, then dashes behind the farthest enemy. After @StunDelay@ second, his phantom returns to Pyke, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Phantom Undertow

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target, then Heal all nearby allies for <scaleHealth>@HealPercent*100@%</scaleHealth> of their missing Health, with an increased radius if the enemy dies.
